entries.name: new(name, description, long_description, usage, options = nil)
formatted_usage(klass, namespace = true, subcommand = false)
entries.desc: Returns the formatted usage by injecting given required arguments and required options into the given usage.

entries.name: run(instance, args = [])
entries.desc: By default, a command invokes a method in the thor class. You can change this implementation to create custom commands.
